radiographic_examinations.findings: Mild gallbladder wall edema, mild amount of dependent gallbladder sludge within a nondistended gallbladder, common bile duct mildly prominent (8.3 mm), mild intrahepatic biliary ductal dilation, no stones seen, no sonographic Murphy's sign.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: Mild gallbladder wall edema as evidenced on the previous CT.
